question.text:
Match the column and select the correct option.
 
  Column I   Column II
(A) Funicle (I) Main part of ovule
(B) Filiform apparatus (II) Protection
(C) Integument (III) Outgrowth in ovule
(D) Nucellus (IV) Connect placenta and main body of ovule
    (V) Synergids

options.text: <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math>

<math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></math>

<math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></math>

<math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math>

solution.text: Stalk of the ovule is called as funicle and the point of attachment of funicle to the body of ovule is called as hilum. Filliform apparatus are finger like projection present on synergids towards micropylar end. Ovule is covered by covering called as integuments.
